MESSAGE.value: viper is downloaded and configuration is done .env file is added token attribute is deleted from database because we don't need it now refresh-token is added different than access token -> user can now enter their email and get a new refresh token admin seed's password is updated (hashed) refreshtokendto is added refreshtoken handler and service are added

config struct is relocated loadconfig is supposed to be in the main but couldn't be handled (might be updated soon) refreshtoken is updated --> clients no longer provide email, they provide a valid token and get their refresh token all the dtos are relocated into a new directory

files, their formats and locations are updated -> repos and services are updated based on business logic all the dtos are seperated now and their helper functions are with the related dtos searchuser's name is changed as filteruser because it's a filtering process roleseed is implemented for userrole creation in the migration default role (user) is decided and coded init function is added to createtoken files to prevent unnecessary memory usage in every function call access and refresh token files are seperated now --> their keys are seperated as well --> and they are not being stored in the database because we don't need it .Table() usage is omitted and .Model() is used rather than that age is getting from the user as birthdate but stored as int -> might be changed later -> also format is not appropriate for now postgres related things are removed from .env file because we don't need them pagination is removed --> will be implemented soon

profiles are added --> after logging in, user can see, update and delete their own profiles updateprofiledto is added middleware, token generators and verificators are updated due to the changes made in main, a new group called profile is added to minimize process

profiles are added --> after logging in, user can see, update and delete their own profiles updateprofiledto is added middleware, token generators and verificators are updated due to the changes made jwt.StandardClaims is deprecated but it's working in main, a new group called profile is added to minimize process refreshtoken is moved into authorized group in main, doesn't need to take dto, it may get the token from auth part --> might be updated
updatestatusbyid is no longer a get method, it's post --> it uses updatestatusdto and gets the status from body, not url
error messages and returns are corrected
pagination is added for filtering

error messages and json codes are updated (using http.status) response & request dtos are renamed seperately after logging in, user can get a new access token with their refresh token --> updated and optimized refresh-token endpoint jwt.StandardClaims --> jwt.RegisteredClaims variable names are updated --> more clear refreshtoken, accesstoken, login, verifytoken and middleware files are updated

error messages and json codes are updated (using http.status) response & request dtos are renamed seperately after logging in, user can get a new access token with their refresh token --> updated and optimized refresh-token endpoint jwt.StandardClaims --> jwt.RegisteredClaims variable names are updated --> more clear refreshtoken, accesstoken, login, verifytoken and middleware files are updated in profile files, we have a todo --> about ids

role authorization is added --> only admins can request specific requests --> rolemiddleware is added 'claims' is updated getuserwithrole repo and service are added --> we can get the user with their roles --> so that we are ok with our architecture --> we can access user roles a todo is left --> order may be added to filtering
getprofile handler bug fix
slight changes in refreshtoken response
email and password validation are added for update, register and login processes
duplicate key (in sign up) and incorrect password/email (in log in) are handled with errors.New
ordering is added for filteruser

postgres related things are removed from the main and written into postgres directory --> sql is no longer used id parsing is removed from profile endpoint --> id is coming from claims now --> endpoint updated /verify endpoint is added to verify email --> smtp will be added soon --> user is created as passive in the beginning, after email verification, user is active --> 6 characters code is generated and written into console -----> verify email handler, service and dto are created type uuid is no longer used in codes --> string conversion is unnecessary again and again --> so they are string now --> uuid usages and their conversions are removed from all the files validators are updated --> invoking the validator.New method in the init block to save memory usage --> signup and login are updated dtos are updated and reformatted mod file is updated

postgres related things are removed from the main and written into postgres directory --> sql is no longer used id parsing is removed from profile endpoint --> id is coming from claims now --> endpoint updated /verify endpoint is added to verify email --> smtp will be added soon --> user is created as passive in the beginning, after email verification, user is active --> 6 characters code is generated and written into console -----> verify email handler, service and dto are created type uuid is no longer used in codes --> string conversion is unnecessary again and again --> so they are string now --> uuid usages and their conversions are removed from all the files validators are updated --> invoking the validator.New method in the init block to save memory usage --> signup and login are updated dtos are updated and reformatted mod file is updated 2 TODOs left --> .env config and SMTP implementation

SMTP is added --> user can receive realtime emails in the registration phase postgres connection, migrate and seed files are seperated as methods verificationcode section is reformatted as pointer --> might be null success message is declared as constant --> httpstatusok, success
ERROR MESSAGES WILL BE HANDLED AGAIN --> TODOs LEFT
custom errors and messages are implemented enum fixes
custom errors are updated c.json messages are updated gin.h is no longer used changes may be done soon

updatebyid (in repo) is updated to handle default values in go signup --> register (renamed) loadconfig is updated to handle all the .env's --> not only local ones --> no todo left here helper, token, email and dto files are renamed fixes
some variables are renamed status attribute is added to updateprofiledto --> but unauthorized/forbidden accesses are handled --> users cannot turn themselves into admins

regex validation is added --> validations are handled with custom validators using regex (email, password, name, surname, age, gender, education, status, role)
education turned into an enum and education.string is added for display part (as string, not int)
"create" methods are deleted completely
